title: Designer Sinorhizobium meliloti strains and multi-functional vectors enable direct inter-kingdom DNA transfer
excerpt: This paper establishes S. meliloti as a effective microbial host to GC-rich DNA. This research will enable manipulation of soil microbiomes, and cloning of previously difficult DNA. SL. Brumwell, MR. MacLeod, T. Huang, RR. Cochrane, RS. Meaney, M. Zamani, O. Matysiakiewicz, KN. Dan, P. Janakirama, DR. Edgell, TC. Charles, TM. Finan, BJ. Karas. (2019). "Designer Sinorhizobium meliloti strains and multi-functional vectors enable direct inter-kingdom DNA transfer." PLoS ONE. 14(7): e0219562.

title: Rapid method for generating designer algal mitochondrial genomes
excerpt: This paper demonstrates the cloning methods (PCR-mediated and TAR-cloning) to successfully capture and manipulate Phaeodactylum tricornutum. In addition, there was host burden observable host burden. This establishes a platform for rapid cloning and manipulation of algal organelle genomes.
citation: RR. Cochrane, SL. Brumwell, MPM. Soltysiak, S. Hamadache, JG. Davis, J. Wang, SQ. Tholl, P. Janakirama, DR. Edgell, BJ. Karas. (2019). "Rapid method for generating designer algal mitochondrial genomes." BioRxiv. (N/A).
